Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Player

  • public class Player
extends Entity
    This class models a player object and extends Entity. It contains all the necessary data for the player in order to play the game.
    Version:
    5.0
    Author:
    Aviv Haber. Created class and moved variables from Entity to here May 23. Approximate Work: 1 hour, Rian Waterson. Added a health variable and related methods May 25. Fixed decHealth method so that it cannot go below 0 June 3. Approximate Work: 1 hour

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double MAX_HEALTH
      The starting health of the player.

    • Constructor Summary

      Player(int x, int y, int width, int height)
